channel.title: Our Projects on Datafortress.cloud
channel.description: Recent content in Our Projects on Datafortress.cloud

item.title: Animated Logo Creation
item.description: Get moving Logos are becoming increasingly important in the digital age.

item.title: Cloud Big Data Analytics
item.description: Enterprises have an enormous amount of data in their hands. Usually, this data is stored in several systems, with different data formats, different security measures, and locations.

item.title: Cloud Compliance
item.description: Whilst working at my former company, we decided to implement some processes in the Cloud.

item.title: Digital Twin
item.description: “A digital twin is a digital replica of a living or non-living physical entity.

item.title: GroupIT Website
item.description: The GroupIT Website has been a requirement by Porsche to offer a way to efficiently deliver information, news, and instructions to its worldwide dealer network.

item.title: Porsche AR Viewer
item.description: The Porsche AR Viewer has been an Augmented Reality app I built during my time at Porsche Austria.

item.title: Website: Porsche AR Viewer
item.description: The website for the Porsche AR Viewer (http://www.discovar.at) had special requirements.

item.title: #unraceable Virtual Reality Simulator
item.description: Unraceable is the name of a virtual reality motionseat project and App that I managed for three years.

item.title: 360° Car Sales – Virtual Testdrives
item.description: Selling used cars is heavily relying on trust. The investment of a car is oftentimes a decision that influences the customer for several years, therefore being a topic that is heavily researched beforehand by him.

item.title: 360° Virtual Tours – Real Estate
item.description: In the spring of 2016, I offered Virtual Tours for Holiday Houses, with a focus on 360 degree and drone aerial photography.

item.title: DataFortress.cloud
item.description: Why not WordPress? To give a further explanation as to why I chose to run this blog completely serverless, please check out my article first.
